name: Ninja Escape (itch) (Jayanthvoyager)
description:
Game Name: Ninja Escape 

Updated Build : Link

Game made by a team of two for BYOG 2021 in 48 hours. https://itch.io/jam/byog

Theme Given: 

  • Reset
  • Two Views
  • Minimal Interaction

Theme Chosen for our game :  

  • Two Views/ Minimal Interaction

Our Idea :

To create a shooting game combining two views on a single screen with minimal interaction for aiming and shooting.

Game Description:

It’s time to rescue our mate from ninja invaders! Will you be up for the challenges ?

In this fast-paced third-person helicopter/first person shooter, you’re on a mission to rescue your teammate and get rid of all the enemies along the way  to reach the exit!

You will be given 2 views for a shooting angle. Keep your eyes on both views, As you might not see some enemies on one view, which will be visible on other. Are you prepared for that? There is only one way to find out!
